Deton:

My name is Deton. I'm a traveling archaelogist. I'm always glad to give a helping hand to other travelers.
Archaeology allows to learn new secret knowledge of ancient times. Thanks to my researches I've caught myself how to teleport. Using this new skill I can teleport you for free wherever you want to.
Choose the place you want to travel. If you are going to teleport in the Dragon Valley, I'll give you a request.
